different_relations.head: METTL3
different_relations.label: methylate
different_relations.text: Previous studies have indicated that METTL3-mediated N6-methyladenosine (m6A) modification is closely associated with PC progression and prognosis.
different_relations.note:
ado
No evidence in this paper that METTL3 metylates the m6A site on Linc00662

different_relations.head: m6A
different_relations.label: is on
different_relations.text: Four m6A motifs were identified in Linc00662, which maintained the stability of Linc00662 in an IGF2BP3-coupled manner and were closely associated with the pro-tumor properties of Linc00662 in vitro and in vivo

different_relations.head: IGF2BP3
different_relations.label: bind
different_relations.text: Four m6A motifs were identified in Linc00662, which maintained the stability of Linc00662 in an IGF2BP3-coupled manner and were closely associated with the pro-tumor properties of Linc00662 in vitro and in vivo

different_relations.head: Linc00662
different_relations.label: recruit
different_relations.text: ITGA1 was identified as a downstream gene regulated by Linc00662. Linc00662 recruites GTF2B to activate the transcription of ITGA1 in a m6A-dependent manner and initiates the formation of focal adhesions through the ITGA1-FAK-Erk pathway

different_relations.head: ITGA1
different_relations.label: activate
different_relations.text: ITGA1 was identified as a downstream gene regulated by Linc00662. Linc00662 recruites GTF2B to activate the transcription of ITGA1 in a m6A-dependent manner and initiates the formation of focal adhesions through the ITGA1-FAK-Erk pathway

different_relations.head: FAK
different_relations.label: activate
different_relations.text: ITGA1 was identified as a downstream gene regulated by Linc00662. Linc00662 recruites GTF2B to activate the transcription of ITGA1 in a m6A-dependent manner and initiates the formation of focal adhesions through the ITGA1-FAK-Erk pathway

different_relations.head: focal adhesion
different_relations.label: promote
different_relations.text: The FAK inhibitor-Y15 obviously repressed tumor progression in Linc00662-overexpressing PC cells in vitro and in vivo

different_relations.head: Linc00662
different_relations.label: promote
different_relations.text: Linc00662 was screened as a m6A-enriched RNA that promoted tumor growth and metastasis in PC cells and mouse models and was associated with poor clinical prognosis

different_relations.head: Linc00662
different_relations.label: promote
different_relations.text: Linc00662 was screened as a m6A-enriched RNA that promoted tumor growth and metastasis in PC cells and mouse models and was associated with poor clinical prognosis

different_relations.head: prostate cancer
different_relations.label: upregulate
different_relations.text: In this study, we found that METTL3 was upregulated in PC tissues and cells and was associated with malignant tumor progression and poor progression-free survival in PC
